mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS (NAME, TEACHER_ID, SLOGAN, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{name}, #{teacherId}, #{slogan}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE CLASS SET NAME = #{name}, TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}, SLOGAN = #{slogan}, MODIFY_DATE = now() WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT NO, NAME, TEACHER_ID, SLOGAN, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM CLASS
SELECT NO, NAME, TEACHER_ID, SLOGAN, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM CLASS WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT NO, NAME, TEACHER_ID, SLOGAN FROM CLASS WHERE TEACHER_ID LIKE '%${teacherId}%'
